original_title: Ancient Evil 2: Guardian of the Underworld
overview: Five jaded young friends foolishly dabble in the dark arts and unleash Anubis, the Egyptian God of the dead, on an unsuspecting New England island. As the body count rises, the survivors must figure out a way to defeat the powerful creature as they fight not only for their lives, but for their very souls.
title: Ancient Evil 2: Guardian of the Underworld
